sentence.Network_en: He gave Robin a mildly quizzical glance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有些惊讶地瞥了罗宾一眼。

sentence.Network_en: He looked up with a quizzical look on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 他脸上带着困惑的神情抬头往上看.

sentence.Network_en: Spruance and Pug Henry exchanged quizzical looks near the end.
sentence.Network_cn: 快结束时,斯普鲁恩斯和帕格·亨利交换了一下探询的眼色.

list.abs: he gave me a quizzical look , but let it go forward .他给了我一个疑惑的表情，但还是让这个计划进行下去了。
smirks , raised eyebrows , and quizzical looks are not out of the realm of possibility , either .傻笑、扬起的眉毛和戏弄的样子都是在可能出现的范围之内的。
others have ended up wearing a permanent , quizzical expression ., 还有些人最后脸上会永远带着一副滑稽古怪的表情.
they looked quizzically at the doctor ., 他们困惑地看着医生.

entry.def: If you give someone a quizzical look or smile, you look at them in a way that shows that you are surprised or amused by their behaviour.

example.ex: He gave Robin a mildly quizzical glance.
example.tran: 他有些惊讶地瞥了罗宾一眼。

sentences.sentence: "his face wore a somewhat quizzical almost impertinent air"- Lawrence Durrell

means.word_mean: 2. perplexed (as if being expected to know something that you do not know);

auth_sentence.content: He has never mastered the quizzical knitted brow.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has never mastered the quizzical knitted brow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has never mastered the quizzical knitted brow.

auth_sentence.content: His quizzical and original mind. He never said what one expected.
